title: Medieval Fantasy Audio Bundle
description: Medieval Fantasy Audio Bundle is the ultimate audio solution for epic fantasy video games.
longDescription:
Extensive sound demos at Soundcloud:

Music

Ambience

RPG Mix

Realistic Mix


If your game is an old style RPG like Zelda or Dragon Quest or, in the other hand, it is a realistic fantastic adventure such as Baldur’s Gate or Diablo, this pack will be the perfect audio companion during your epic quest.

Medieval Fantasy Audio Bundle contains 311 unique high quality music loops, ambiance loops and special FX, isolated and premixed, in .wav format ready to use.


11 original music loops, high quality that will suit perfect for several usual fantasy situations.


16 original ambience loops: 8 fx ambient loops and their 8 instrumental ambient versions which offer even more solutions for the musical aspect of your game!


284 original SFX with different versions of each one in most of cases. Very useful sounds usually needed for fantasy rpg, adventure, epic, medieval games.


contact@taoandsound.com
technicalDetails:
Medieval Fantasy Audio Bundle contains 311 original audio files in .wav version. Music & Ambiance files loop seamlessly.

11 original music loops, high quality that will suit perfect for several usual fantasy situations. You will find a good variety like mistery, night, dungeons, castle, forest, battles, boss fight…

16 original ambience loops: 8 fx ambient loops and their 8 instrumental ambient versions which offer even more solutions for the musical aspect of your game! High quality, very realistic ambients for dungeons or caves, the king’s castle, forest, camp, taverns or market place.

284 original SFX with different versions of each one in most of cases. Very useful sounds usually needed for fantasy rpg, adventure, epic, medieval games. Of course it contains the “event” sound effects which offer good solutions for any kind of scene in your games such as “game over”, leveling up, chapter intros, treasure found and many more.

Quality: 44.100 Hz – .Wav bitrate: 192 Kbps
